name: BookGenie
0:
”Alexa open book genie”
”Alexa, ask book genie a question about the book”
”Alexa, ask book genie about something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: book genie
des:
Specially developed to support and enhance kids’ growth and intuition. Designed with kids 5 to 8 years old in mind. Try it now!
Chat with Book Genie!
Book genie was actually born from an Aladdin bottle! Therefore, book genie has all the magical skills and ingredients, to offer you a fabulous interactive experience while reading any book you have chosen. Alexa will ask you questions about the book you have just read.
Book genie is your friend and your personal tutor.
Tell us what you think of the experience. It helps us improve in future versions!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
